    • ";parent.innerHTML+=add;}function Show(id){document.getElementById(id).style.visibility='visible';}function Hide(id){document.getElementById(id).style.visibility='hidden';}function loadPopup(popup){var target="./Content/"+popup+".txt";readTextFile(target,function(text){document.getElementById("project_view").innerHTML=text;});}function readJsonFile(file,callback){var rawFile=new XMLHttpRequest();rawFile.overrideMimeType("application/json");rawFile.open("GET",file,true);rawFile.onreadystatechange=function(){if(rawFile.readyState===4&&rawFile.status=="200"){callback(rawFile.responseText);}};rawFile.send(null);}function readTextFile(file,callback){var rawFile=new XMLHttpRequest();rawFile.overrideMimeType("application/txt");rawFile.open("GET",file,true);rawFile.onreadystatechange=function(){if(rawFile.readyState===4&&rawFile.status=="200"){callback(rawFile.responseText);}};rawFile.send(null);}function addProjectViews(projectList,popupList){if(projectList!=null){readJsonFile("./data.json",function(text){var list=JSON.parse(text);var k=-1;list.Projects.forEach(function(element){loadProjectViewObject(projectList,element.Title,element.Image,element.Desc,element.Popup);if(element.Popup!=null&&popupList!=null){loadPopup(element.Popup);}});list.Languages.forEach(function(element){loadLanguages(element);});list.Education.forEach(function(element){loadEducation(element);});});}}addProjectViews(document.getElementById('project_list'),document.getElementById('projects'));
